title: nextContext arg in shouldComponentUpdate() method
body:

**Do you want to request a *feature* or report a *bug*?**
I think it is feature, but could be a bug also

**What is the current behavior?**
When I subscribe to context using React16.6.0 contextType API, component rerenders even when unused context properties was changed. So, I want to use shouldComponentUpdate(), but that method don't have nextContext argument.

Is there any other way to solve this problem?

Your bug will get fixed much faster if we can run your code and it doesn't have dependencies other than React. Paste the link to your JSFiddle (https://jsfiddle.net/Luktwrdm/) or CodeSandbox (https://codesandbox.io/s/new) example below:**
